item.title: :{Creepypasta Pixel Doll}: Berserk (full)
item.media:title: :{Creepypasta Pixel Doll}: Berserk (full)
item.media:description:
This is my personal Creepypasta OC (if I was a pasta)
Full Pixel Doll view point, with and without her sweatshirt. Keep in mind that the description isn't a full fledged on bio, it's just a 'short' description for minor things.



Short Description~

Proxy Name: Berserk
Gender: Female
Accessories:
-Dark gray hoodie
-Black tank top
-Sky blue skinny jeans
-Black knee-high boots
-Black fingerless biker gloves
Weapon:
-Sledgehammer (preferred)






Art SkylerSpark
Lineart Quasiii 


Other Link:
:{Creepypasta Pixel Doll}: Berserk

item.media:description:
"Psycho Teddy"


Psycho Teddy!

Oh my teddy, you're so bouncy.
Lovely little cutie,
wont you cuddle me, cuddle me, cuddle me, cuddle me?
Oh my teddy, you're so bouncy
Lovely little cutie,
wont you follow me, follow me, follow me, follow me?


Oh my teddy, you're so bouncy.
Lovely little cutie,
wont you cuddle me, cuddle me, cuddle me, cuddle me?
Oh my teddy, you're so bouncy.
Lovely little cutie,
wont you follow me, follow me, follow me?

Just squeeze me

Do you really really really really want to?
Do you really really really really want to?
Do you really really really really want to?

I'm a psycho, psycho teddy.

Do you really really really really want to?
Do you really really really really want to?
Do you really really really really want to?

I'm a psycho, psycho teddy..

Psycho AAH! Psycho BLAAH! Psycho BLEH!
PsyCAH BLEH! Psycho BLAAH! AAH! BLEEH! HOOHOO!
Psycho OOH! Psycho BLEH! Psycho BLEH BLEH AAH!
Psycho BLEH! Psyc-BLEH! Psycho BLEH!

item.title: Foksigurd (WIP)
item.media:title: Foksigurd (WIP)
item.media:description:
Foksigurd Blodmakur belongs to

I don’t often post Works in Progress... but I thought this one was kind of worth it. Also I wanted to ask PatchKatz if the character was looking alright. :3 I tried to give him a more savage, more cruel sort of look but maybe I didn’t make him as chaotic looking as he should be?

I must have redone this sketch a few times and each time fixing and editing and erasing to redraw parts and pieces. I got really invested in this xD so much fun but also I really wanted to get the character just right and whatnot.

I’m not sure yet if I’ll color traditionally or digitally. That’s yet to be seen but I’ll be up to inking it real soon... after a get a little more feedback on this particular sketch.
item.description:

I must have redone this sketch a few times and each time fixing and editing and erasing to redraw parts and pieces. I got really invested in this xD so much fun but also I really wanted to get the character just right and whatnot.

I’m not sure yet if I’ll color traditionally or digitally. That’s yet to be seen but I’ll be up to inking it real soon... after a get a little more feedback on this particular sketch.

item.title: A Character in 3 styles
item.media:title: A Character in 3 styles
item.media:description:
Hey, everyone! It's been ages since I last posted but I've got a little bit of a break again! Anyway, here is a drawing of an original character for a story I want to work on in 3 different styles: Song of the Sea, Berserk (Something I've been interested in as of late), and One Piece! I'm very happy with how this turned out! 

Hope you enjoy this and further pieces to come!

And I must say it is thanks to that I got this completed, since she collaborated with me to complete this work :>
item.description:
Hey, everyone! It's been ages since I last posted but I've got a little bit of a break again! Anyway, here is a drawing of an original character for a story I want to work on in 3 different styles: Song of the Sea, Berserk (Something I've been interested in as of late), and One Piece! I'm very happy with how this turned out! 

Hope you enjoy this and further pieces to come!

And I must say it is thanks to that I got this completed, since she collaborated with me to complete this work :>

item.title: Binoka
item.media:title: Binoka
item.media:description:
Age: 15
Gender: Female
Height: 164 cm (5'4")
Weight 48 kg (106 lb)
B-W-H: 150-50-85
Abilities: Super Strength (capable of holding very heavy objects and landing powerful punches), Attractive, Frenzied State
Weakness: Nyctophobia, Being Alone, Going Berserk
Binoka is the main protagonist of Rose Burst

item.title: Grimmheim - Summer of Manga Oneshot
item.media:title: Grimmheim - Summer of Manga Oneshot
item.media:description:
Hello dear Deviants!
My deviantArt is pretty much dead, but if ANYONE is still around, I am proud to announce you something:

My short story "Grimmheim", a historical-fantasy comic featuring Joan of Arc / Jeanne d´Arc, has been published!
It´s available in the digital shonen manga anthology Saturday AM! Inside of the 89th issue (CRAZY ), you can read my little short story, as well as another kick-ass one, "D.I.D" by the one and only Frae! The stories are part of the current Summer of Manga event!

So, if you´re interested, give it a try! >0<

Link:
www.saturday-am.com/issues/sat…
Download it for FREE!!

Also, follow me on my instagram
instagram.com/grimmheim

item.title: Maydrium From my original series (Carriers)
item.media:title: Maydrium From my original series (Carriers)
item.media:description:
Lady Maydrium. Assila's older sister from my original dark fantasy series, "Carriers." known for her beauty Maydrium (May-Jree-Um) Is the more elegant, and has class unlike her barbaric sister Assila   

Music I listened to when making this picture: Berserk Forces 2

The hardest part of this picture was the hair. her red locks gave me a lot of problems.
item.description:
Lady Maydrium. Assila's older sister from my original dark fantasy series, "Carriers." known for her beauty Maydrium (May-Jree-Um) Is the more elegant, and has class unlike her barbaric sister Assila   

Music I listened to when making this picture: Berserk Forces 2

The hardest part of this picture was the hair. her red locks gave me a lot of problems.

item.title: Assila from my original story (Carriers)
item.media:title: Assila from my original story (Carriers)
item.media:description:
A colored in picture of Assila from my original series Carriers.

Carriers is my adult series. If you like the anime Berserk or the game God Of War. you'll love this series. Its full of blood, gore, action, nudity, Demon slicing and dicing, adult humor, and much more.
From Fauns, harpies to giants if its dark fantasy. its in Carriers.

This piece took me 2 days to finish

From Fauns, harpies to giants if its dark fantasy. its in Carriers.

This piece took me 2 days to finish

haha i finally got to the point to draw this oc,, my lovely boi <3

negativity is a ass, screw you negativity >:'c

Oh yeah also ignore the red blob head thingy whatever,, thats my persona lol xD

small fact I could give about this fella is that he is like a stuff toy! for animal he's based is kinda uhhh,, unknown lol,, he is a mix i guess? ;3;

two moods: normal and berserk ;3

item.title: RP doodle dump: Berserkers
item.media:title: RP doodle dump: Berserkers
item.media:description:
More RP scenes form a game i have been playing with Tried a new shading trick in color. i think it looks pretty nifty so far.

The characters here are:
Dr.Donnie (upper right corner)
Siv (the small irken with the helmet)

Shadow's characters here are:
Chase (the one pressed up against the glass)
Switch: (the one spooked by the pak legs)
Zaza: (the one who wont just sit still and take his medicine)

item.title: 8-Bit Ver. 2
item.media:title: 8-Bit Ver. 2
item.media:description:
Well ladies and gentlemen, I can safely say out of all
the changes I made to my OC's since the first profiles,
8-Bit was the one that had the most changes given to
her in terms of backstory and development.

Here's a rough idea of her backstory:

A new genetic engineering institute was erected in Richmond Virginia.
The institute was called "Project Darwin".  It was established and staffed
by scientists who would represent their ethnic backgrounds as anything but
European (these stories will have an odd way of tackling race if I haven't
said that before). Asian, African, Hispanic, even Native American, they all joined 
collaborated in order to fend off a recurring threat. That same threat
was a tribe of ogreish savages dubbed the Skull Face who would feast
on the people that weren't like them and destroy any civilization that
didn't conform to their beliefs. The frequent terrorizing made their attempts
more desperate by the day, until the scientists agreed on one solution: splice
the genes of their offspring with dangerous predators.

Unfortunately, 8-Bit was one of their earlier experiments and as a baby,
couldn't cope with the rapid changes her body was receiving after being
fused with a baby Great White Shark. Not only did she experience new
urges and an extreme boost in growth and strength, the memories of
the shark pup of being taken away from her family ran through baby
8-Bit's head like a frantic highway after smelling blood. These dangerous
situations caused her to create more problems than the institution could
afford. Causing the scientists, including one that was her own mother,
to reject her.

After being drugged into sedation, 8-Bit was dumped into a nearby
landfill, where she was left for dead. She stayed there for three
days before a previously poor man who just got out the gutter
he once lived in, sympathized with the baby he saw wallowing
in garbage and decided to take her in. Eventually, the baby
grew up with a pair of two loving fathers who do their best
to keep her shark like instincts in check. So, far, playing video
games seemed to be the best solution in calming her down.
Wait, wouldn't video games encourage violence in kids?
Apparently not if we're talking a young human/shark hybrid.
Show's what people with zero gaming experience know.

Thank you for reading and viewing my new 8-Bit profile.
Have yourselves a good day and I hope Passover and
Good Friday treated you all well (and whatever Islamic
holiday can be compared to the two. We're all religious
cousins after all.)

Character and art by me.
Drawn with Clip Studio Paint.

item.title: Berserk Bev - Fantasy Fighting
item.media:title: Berserk Bev - Fantasy Fighting
item.media:description:
Yay! I haven't drawn anything of Beverly or PorterExpress in a long time and I'm happy to do so again. So this is for the group that I joined some time ago and right now, the theme they have going on is Fantasy and fighting where basically members pick what their characters would be like in a fantasy settings and then fight for sport.

Ooh, I'm so excited to fight people! Enjoy
item.description:
Yay! I haven't drawn anything of Beverly or PorterExpress in a long time and I'm happy to do so again. So this is for the group that I joined some time ago and right now, the theme they have going on is Fantasy and fighting where basically members pick what their characters would be like in a fantasy settings and then fight for sport.

Ooh, I'm so excited to fight people! Enjoy

item.title: Fat Tessis - Berserk Costume Obese Edition
item.media:title: Fat Tessis - Berserk Costume Obese Edition
item.media:description:
Commission for
of the ever-so-thicc Tessis, which belongs to BlastshieldBuddy (His OC)!  :> 


Load of fun to come back to Tessis again, she's always a lot of wobbly joy to revisit!
And what better way to revisit her, than to see her dressed in a Halloween costume! :3

But, the spooks are not done yet, more to come very very soon! 

More Tessis here:






Also, I am open for commissions.
If you wish to know more, check out my commission journal!
Plumpchu is OPEN for Commissions!Plumpchu Commissions are back! :>
Let's draw some fatties! :3

Interested in commissioning me? Send me a Note, or e-mail me at plumpchu@gmail.com!
Cartoony Style!:
35$ USD per character

Painterly Style!:
35$ USD per character

I draw:
- Humans, anthro, furry, monsters, anything! 
- Any gender!
- Any size, but preferably chubby or bigger. You can go as fat as you want! <3
- Fan art and OCs/original characters
- Blueberry/Inflation
- Many kinks, unless I'm uncomfortable with it.
 
All payments are done through Paypal and I only accept USD as currency.

- Any size, but preferably chubby or bigger. You can go as fat as you want! <3

All payments are done through Paypal and I only accept USD as currency.

item.title: Cephalopod Dot Matrix
item.media:title: Cephalopod Dot Matrix
item.media:description:
The Decisive Blow : A staple attack amongst battle mangas and giant robot animes. It is necessary for our hero to strike a cool pose while looking away from the explosion.
For after all, cool guys don't look at explosions.


I was also going for a very Mignola-esque inspired background hence the random tentacles.


3of 3 of his request:
Max:
luke-crowe.deviantart.com/favo…

item.title: RWBY X Berserk!M!Reader: Berserked Hunter part 5
item.media:title: RWBY X Berserk!M!Reader: Berserked Hunter part 5
item.media:description: Part 5 finally out! Sorry about the delay, I was slacking all weekend. And sorry if it seemed a bit rushed towards the end, I found it a bit difficult to find a way to fit the reader into this part of Volume 1. On the bright side, I managed to fit in another character related to you, the reader, and fit a certain Berserk item that will advance your story...
item.media:text:
Finally! End of the semester!

"So guys, it's the weekend." pointed out Casca. "Anything special?" She asked, as we walked out of our last class of the semester.
"Well, I hear the city is setting up decorations for the Vytal festival." said Fumiko.
"Ah, right." said Griffith. "The transfer students are arriving today aren't they?"
"Indeed they are." said Casca. "You wanna try and spy on them?"
"Why would we wanna do that?" I asked.

"To gain the upper hand in the tournament, of course!" exclaimed Weiss who popped up next to Casca's side. "It seems like you and me both have similar minds! Y'know, I invited my team to go out into Vale to 'see t
item.description: Part 5 finally out! Sorry about the delay, I was slacking all weekend. And sorry if it seemed a bit rushed towards the end, I found it a bit difficult to find a way to fit the reader into this part of Volume 1. On the bright side, I managed to fit in another character related to you, the reader, and fit a certain Berserk item that will advance your story...

item.title: RWBY x Berserk!M!Reader!: The Berserked Huntsman
item.media:title: RWBY x Berserk!M!Reader!: The Berserked Huntsman
item.media:description:
Right now, this story has no specific character for the love interest of the story. It will result as a matter of personal choice, but feel free to ask which character. I might consider the most favoured character, however right now, it may come down to personal choice.

And one last thing, thanks for reading!
item.media:text:
*(f/n) POV*

Among dozens of other teenagers, I looked out the window of the Bullhead as I watched Beacon academy grow larger as we travelled closer to the landing pad. A large grin emerged on my face, a grin so large my mouth was hurting. For most, you wouldn't grin this much for going to a school, but this school in particular, deserved to be smiled upon by those who enter. For Beacon, getting a place for the initiation exam was hard, VERY hard. So it's only normal that I would be happy about this. As the Bullhead stopped moving and began to hover, I swept my (h/c) hair back (Only for it to fall back into place), rotated my shoulders to loo
item.description:
Right now, this story has no specific character for the love interest of the story. It will result as a matter of personal choice, but feel free to ask which character. I might consider the most favoured character, however right now, it may come down to personal choice.

And one last thing, thanks for reading!

Materiales: Tableta digitalizadora, Photoshop.

¡Saludos!

item.title: [CE] Blood Moon
item.media:title: [CE] Blood Moon
item.media:description:
Click download for full size!

's tengu OC, Darius!
hey buddy you managed to have all of my favorite things (monster boys, demons, and crows) together in 1 oc how'd you manage to do that. naturally, I had to draw him. and even more naturally I had to draw him going beserk in full demon mode because that's quality content right there 👌👌👌👌👌

random notes:
-I really liked what you said about the out of control shadow powers so I tried to draw that out in this piece! especially the shadow spears. I hope this was along the lines of what you were imagining :3c
-I saw that one of his inspirations was Ulquiorra so i,, , , , totally was thinking of the hollow world when doing the bg //shot. pls enjoy the freaky moons and ominous black background uvu
-since Darius is also inspired by howl, I also went for a more birdlike look for the feathers and fluff!
-I was originally going to go for a more complex outfit for him, but really wanted to show off all the feathers he had on, so here's a simple skirt thing :')

Thanks for taking the time to answer my 7586398279547 questions about your oc! regardless of the outcome of the contest, I hope you continue to write and draw about your babies. and if ur ever looking for character interactions or to just chat about OCs, hmu uvu

-favorited the contest journal
-journal shared here
item.description:
Click download for full size!

's tengu OC, Darius!
hey buddy you managed to have all of my favorite things (monster boys, demons, and crows) together in 1 oc how'd you manage to do that. naturally, I had to draw him. and even more naturally I had to draw him going beserk in full demon mode because that's quality content right there 👌👌👌👌👌

random notes:
-I really liked what you said about the out of control shadow powers so I tried to draw that out in this piece! especially the shadow spears. I hope this was along the lines of what you were imagining :3c
-I saw that one of his inspirations was Ulquiorra so i,, , , , totally was thinking of the hollow world when doing the bg //shot. pls enjoy the freaky moons and ominous black background uvu
-since Darius is also inspired by howl, I also went for a more birdlike look for the feathers and fluff!
-I was originally going to go for a more complex outfit for him, but really wanted to show off all the feathers he had on, so here's a simple skirt thing :')

Thanks for taking the time to answer my 7586398279547 questions about your oc! regardless of the outcome of the contest, I hope you continue to write and draw about your babies. and if ur ever looking for character interactions or to just chat about OCs, hmu uvu

-favorited the contest journal
-journal shared here

item.title: Tobias Ref Sheet - Redesign+Berserk Form
item.media:title: Tobias Ref Sheet - Redesign+Berserk Form
item.media:description:
I won 2 starbeans at the Beango!!! So I decided to get my head down and give Tobias a proper redesign with the mutations I wanted most - long fur and different tail. I also used the Skull Bean I bought at the Carnival to give him a Berserk form I was planning on!!! Now he's a BEAST!!! I'll hopefully be planning a story around this! And while I was at it, I fiddled with his colour design a little (and traded someone for a Body Dye Potion so I could do so). I also have a Whap custom on the way, which I want to involve with him too!!! So lots of things planned, very excited! And much more pleased with this design than the last 2 8w8 He's of course not approved quite yet but as soon as the body dye potion is transferred then I'll go to get him confirmed!

PLEASE USE THIS REF SHEET WHEN DRAWING TOBIAS!!!


ALL ITEMS USED:
x2  x1
Body Dye Potion x1  x1

PEAS EARNED (once this design is approved):
x09
(not counting shading since it's very minimal)

---

Art/character Tobias belongs to me.
Bagbeans Species/original design (before my edits, see masterlist entry - 206 - Wolverine ) belongs to griffsnuff
Made with Paint Tool SAI.
Please do not trace/repost/etc.

item.title: Codename: Statyk - Dawn of Justice - Chapter 8
item.media:title: Codename: Statyk - Dawn of Justice - Chapter 8
item.media:description:
Another whole chapter for the big black dragon, finally facing Archangel and getting ready for a strong fight.

Note: Flagged as mature for blood/violence.
---
More chapters: mctaylis.deviantart.com/galler…
---
Written by Demron1992
With characters and ideas by McTaylis
Edited by Kujjles
item.media:text:
Chapter 8 - Ramparts

A cold wind blew over the bleak landscape stretched before Draeter, searching and twisting its way through countless long forgotten tombstones, bearing the whispering echos of a thousand tears, wept by countless bereaved scalies over hundreds of years. The weathered state of the stones left much up to imagination in terms of their owner, each covered in thick grass left to reclaim the burial, though some happened to have a flickering candle left on them. The weather was particularly sporadic; a once blue sky was now cloud-covered, drizzling, and windy.

“A simple weather change won't stop me from getting the inform
item.description:
Another whole chapter for the big black dragon, finally facing Archangel and getting ready for a strong fight.

Note: Flagged as mature for blood/violence.
---

---
Written by Demron1992
With characters and ideas by McTaylis
Edited by Kujjles

item.title: 038-365 Two Sides of the Same Coin.
item.media:title: 038-365 Two Sides of the Same Coin.
item.media:description:
038-365 Two Sides of the Same Coin.

I drawn a request from a friend who roleplays Yukiteru Amano when he wins the Future Dairy War to become a god of time and space then happens to obtain Neon Genesis Evangelion Powers until after months of RP: He changed for the better and worst in terms of crossover powers to Tokyo Ghoul and Berserk into two in violent proportions.. As a Friend. I indulged some art for him: albiet not entirely my best work.

item.title: BEWARE THE GINGERBREAD BOI
item.media:title: BEWARE THE GINGERBREAD BOI
item.media:description:
"wow crash bandicoot has changed a lot" --Gummy 2k17

hello darkness my old friend



I was helping a customer at work today at the cash register, and one of the items appeared on the screen as "SHOPKINS TOP TRUMP"

......
SHOPKINS TOP TRUMP
??????????????????????????????????????????

I guess it's not as bad as "TURTLE STRETCH BRA" but it definitely confused me for a solid minute
